meanings.definition: The art of effective or persuasive speaking or writing.
meanings.sent1: Her rhetorics in the debate captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The professor's class on rhetorics was very informative.
meanings.sent3: His use of rhetorics in the presentation was so convincing!
meanings.sent4: She mastered the rhetorics of storytelling.
meanings.sent5: The power of his rhetorics left a lasting impact on the audience.

meanings.definition: The study of writing or speaking as a means of communication or persuasion.
meanings.sent1: Studying rhetorics helps you understand effective communication.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a course on rhetorics and public speaking.
meanings.sent3: The book on rhetorics made me appreciate the art of language.
meanings.sent4: In the world of politics, understanding rhetorics is crucial.
meanings.sent5: The rhetorics of advertising can influence consumer behavior.
